subject: [Radiance-general] Solera diffusing glazing - Radiance models?
body:
So far, I haven't found anything other than a simple "trans" material...and yet I know Radiance simulations have been done with the Solera material. Anyone seen, or know of, BRTDF measurements for Solera glazing? Or is "trans" what there is?

Randolph M. Fritz
Lighting Designer

Luma
206.596.8625 d
Portland | San Francisco | Seattle
lumald.com

inspire  interpret  integrate
